meanings.definition: Qualities or attributes traditionally associated with men.
meanings.sent1: His masculinity was evident in his strong physique and deep voice.
meanings.sent2: Society often expects men to display masculinity through toughness and independence.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his exaggerated masculinity made him stand out as the 'manliest' of all.
meanings.sent4: The masculinity of the lion was apparent as he roared fiercely to protect his pride.
meanings.sent5: The cowboy's masculinity shone through as he fearlessly rode into the sunset.

meanings.sent1: His masculinity was celebrated during the traditional male initiation ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that his patient's masculinity was a key factor in his diagnosis.
meanings.sent3: In the all-male choir, his lack of masculinity was humorously highlighted during the high notes.
meanings.sent4: The masculinity of the mountain was evident in its towering presence and rugged terrain.
meanings.sent5: The masculinity of the old oak tree was undeniable as it stood tall and proud in the forest.
